name: 楊永欽
objective:
This is a seminar for energy optics and materials program students.
Several lectures will be held in a semester.
We will ask students to visit some exhibitions and give report.
scorePolicy: according to the quality of report
consultation: please contact by email and further arrangement ycyang@ntut.edu.tw
